name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.17.4. Requires Java 17 as the minimum compatible version. Requires Gradle 7.0 as the minimum compatible version.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.16.4.

name: Gradle Toolchains support
body: Adds support for Gradle Toolchains.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.16.3. Makes jOOQ 3.16.x the minimum required version when using this plugin. Upgrades used 3rd-party dependencies.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Avoids deprecation warnings at Gradle runtime. Upgrades to jOOQ 3.15.1.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.15. Makes Java 11 the minimum required version when using this plugin.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.14.11.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.14.7.

name: Abortion of task execution if output cleaning is disabled
body: Fails the build if cleaning of the output directory is set to false in the jOOQ configuration. Upgrades to jOOQ 3.13.5.

name: Exposure of code-gen dependency with compile scope
body: Exposes the org.jooq:jooq-codegen library as `compile` dependency instead of `runtime` dependency of the jOOQ plugin.

name: Explicit opt-in to participate in incremental builds
body:
Requires explicit opt-in to participate in Gradle's incremental build feature. 

Upgrade notes: if your jOOQ task has all inputs declared such that it can participate in incremental builds and build caching, you now have to explicitly set the `allInputsDeclared` task property to `true`. See the [documentation](https://github.com/etiennestuder/gradle-jooq-plugin/blob/master/README.md#configuring-the-jooq-generation-task-to-participate-in-incremental-builds).

name: Explicit deletion of content in output directory
body: Explicitly cleans output directory before generating jOOQ sources.

name: Implicit exclusion of empty JDBC configuration
body: Implicitly excludes empty JDBC configuration from being written to the jOOQ configuration XML file.

name: Bug fixes
body: Supports dependency substitution to use different versions of the jOOQ dependencies than those pulled in by the jOOQ plugin.

name: Configuration DSL changes and Gradle Kotlin DSL support
body: Comes with a changed configuration DSL. Supports Gradle Kotlin DSL. Adds task inputs normalization hook for the jOOQ configuration. Supports Gradle Configuration Cache. Requires Gradle 6.1 as the minimum compatible version. Upgrades to jOOQ 3.13.4.

name: Support for new jOOQ editions
body: Adds new jOOQ editions for Java 8 and Java 6. Upgrades to jOOQ 3.13.1.

name: Option to remove wiring from compile task to code generation task
body: Provides a global flag to turn off auto-generation of the jOOQ schema source when compiling the containing source set.

name: Gradle 5.0 minimum compatibility
body: Requires Gradle 5.0 as the minimum compatible version. Upgrades to jOOQ 3.12.3.

name: Out-of-the-box compatibility with JDK 9+
body: Explicitly adds JAXB dependencies to run on JDK 9 and higher out-of-the-box. Upgrades to jOOQ 3.11.9.

name: Bug fixes
body: Fixes issue https://github.com/etiennestuder/gradle-jooq-plugin/issues/77.

name: jOOQ build cache effectiveness improvement
body: Improves Gradle build cache effectiveness of the jOOQ task by relativizing the output directory to the project directory and by using a uniqueness-ensuring hashing approach for the final jOOQ configuration.

name: jOOQ 3.11.x upgrade
body: Restores compatibility with jOOQ 3.11.x which broke API backward compatibility with 3.10.x.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.10.4.

name: Removal of wiring between clean task and deleting generated jOOQ sources
body: Removes wiring between clean task and deleting generated jOOQ sources.

name: jOOQ default version
body: Uses jOOQ 3.10.1 as the default dependency version that is applied.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.10.1.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.9.5.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.9.2 and does not mark the jOOQ task as cacheable anymore.

name: Task cacheability
body: Makes the jOOQ task cacheable by the Gradle build cache.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.9.1 and adds better configuration error messages.

name: jOOQ upgrade
body: Upgrades to jOOQ 3.9.0.

name: Configuration of call-backs for code generation java execution process
body:
Fixes issue https://github.com/etiennestuder/gradle-jooq-plugin/issues/25.
Fixes issue https://github.com/etiennestuder/gradle-jooq-plugin/issues/26.

name: Bug fixes
body: Fixes issue https://github.com/etiennestuder/gradle-jooq-plugin/issues/24.

name: Support for custom jOOQ code generator version
body: DSL of the gradle-jooq-plugin allows to specify what jOOQ version and what jOOQ edition to be applied by the jOOQ source code generator.
